sen.e: Also a group of pieces of tegoto called "shishimono"(pieces about lions) such as "Azuma Jishi" and "Echigojishi", both by Koto MINEZAKI, and "Miyamajishi" (by Koto ISHIKAWA) have a feature of stylish and gorgeous melodies rather than being a direct description of shishimai (lion dance).
